body.div:
BLANK
namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
evam me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhu
āmantesi bhikkhavo ti bhadante ti te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum bhagavā etadavoca sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo bhikkhave desessāmi taṃ suṇātha
sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmī ti evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum bhagavā etadavoca
idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujja
no ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme akovidonīto pa
ṭhaviṃ paṭhavito saṃjānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito saṃñatvā paṭhaviṃ maṃñati paṭhaviyā maṃñati paṭhavito maṃñati paṭhavim meti maṃñati paṭhaviṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃ
ñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ āpato saṃjānāti āpaṃ āpato saṃñatvā āpaṃ maṃñati āpasmiṃ maṃñati āpato maṃñati āpam meti maṃñati āpaṃ abhinandati
taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi tejaṃ tejato saṃjānāti tejaṃ tejato saṃñatvā tejaṃ maṃñati tejasmiṃ maṃñati tejato maṃñati teja
m meti maṃñati tejaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vāyaṃ vāyato saṃjānāti vāyaṃ vāyato saṃñatvā vāyaṃ maṃñati vāyasmiṃ
maṃñati vāyato maṃñati vāyato maṃñati vāyam meti maṃñati vāyaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
bhūte bhūtanoto saṃjānā
ti bhūte bhūtato saṃñatvā bhūte maṃñati bhūtesu maṃñati bhūtato maṃñati bhūte meti maṃñati bhūte abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti
vadāmi deve devato saṃjānāti deve devato saṃñatvā deve maṃñati devesu maṃñati devato maṃñati deve meti maṃñati deve abhinanda
ti taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito saṃjānāti pajāpatitiṃ pajāpatito saṃñatvā pajāpatiṃ maṃñati pajāpatismiṃ maṃñati pajāpatito maṃñati pajāpatimmeti maṃñati pajāpatiṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi brahmaṃ brahmato saṃjānāti brahmaṃ brahmato saṃñatvā brahmaṃ maṃñati brahmaṃni maṃñati brahmato maṃñati brahma meti
maṃñati brahmaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ābhassare ābhassarato saṃjānāti ābhassare ābhassarato saṃñatvā ābhassare maṃñati ābhassaresu maṃñati ābhassarato maṃñati ābhassare meti maṃñati ābhassare abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi subhakiṇṇaṃ subhakiṇhato saṃjānāti subhakiṇhesu subhakiṇha
to saṃñatvā subhakiṇhe maṃñati subhakiṇhesu maṃñati subhakiṇhato maṃñati subhakiṇha meti maṃñati subhakiṇhe abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vehappale vehappalato saṃjānāti vehappale vehappalato saṃñatvā vehappale maṃñati vehappalesu maṃñati vehappalato maṃñati vehappa
le meti maṃñati vehappale abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi abhibhuṃ abhibhūto saṃjānāti abhibhuṃ abhibhūto saṃñatvā abhibhuṃ maṃñati abhibhusmiṃ maṃñati abhibhūto maṃñati abhibhummeti maṃñati abhibhuṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ākāsā
nañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato sañjānāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato saṃñatvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanato maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ meti maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti
vadāmi viṃñāṇañcāyatanaṃ viṃñāṇañcāyataṇano sañjānāti viṃñāṇaṃcāyatanaṃ viṃñāṇaṃcāyatanato saṃñatvā viṃñāṇaṃcāyatanaṃ maṃñati viṃñāṇañcāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati viṃñāṇaṃcāyatanano maṃñati viṃñāṇañcāyatanammeti maṃñati viṃñāṇaṃcāyata
ṇaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ākiñcañcaṃñāyatanaṃ ākiñcaṃñāyatanato saṃjānāti ākiñcaṃñāyatanaṃ ākiñcaṃñāyatanato saṃñatvā ākiñcaṃñāyatanaṃ maṃñati ākiñcaṃñāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati ākiñcaṃñāyatanato maṃñati ākiñcaṃñāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa
hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanaṃ nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanato saṃjānāti nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanaṃ nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanato saṃñatvā nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanaṃ maṃñati nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanato
maṃñati nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanato meti maṃñati nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato sañjānāti diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato saṃñatvā diṭṭhaṃ maṃñati diṭṭhasmiṃ maṃñati diṭṭhato maṃñati diṭṭham meti maṃñati diṭṭhaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
sutaṃ sutato sañjānāti sutaṃ sutato saṃñatvā sutaṃ maṃñati sutasmiṃ maṃñati sutato maṃñati sutam meti maṃñati sutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi mutaṃ mutato saṃjānāti mutato saṃñatvā mutaṃ maṃñati mutasmiṃ maṃñati mutato maṃñati mutam meti maṃñati mutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viṃñātaṃ
viṃñātato saṃjānāti viṃñātaṃ viṃñātato saṃñatvā viṃñātato saṃñatvā viṃñātaṃ maṃñati viṃñā viṃñātasmiṃ maṃñati viṃñātato maṃñati viṃñātam meti maṃñati viṃñātaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ekattā ekattato saṃjānāti ekattaṃ ekattato saṃñatvā ekattaṃ maṃñati ekattasmiṃ mañati ekattato maṃña
ti ekattatommammeti maṃñati ekattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nānattattaṃ nānattato saṃjānāti nānattaṃ nānattato saṃñatvā nānattaṃ māṃmaṃñati nānattasmiṃ maṃñati nānattato maṃñati nānattammeti maññati nānattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi sabbaṃ sabbato saṃjānāti sabbaṃ sabbato saṃñatvā sabbaṃ maṃñati sabbasmiṃ maṃñati sabbato maṃñati sabbammeti maṃñati sabbaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nibbānaṃ nibbānato saṃjānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato saṃñatvā nibbānaṃ maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ maṃñati nibbānato maṃñati nibbānammeti maṃñati nibbaṃbbānaṃ abhina
ndati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi assutavanta puthujjanābhavaseti paṭhamakabhūmiparicchedo
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu sekho appattamānaso anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ pattatthayamāno viharati sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñā
ya paṭhaviṃ vā maṃñati paṭhaviyā vā maṃñati paṭhavito vā maṃñati paṭhavim meti vā maṃñati paṭhavi vāabhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariñeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ...pe... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe
vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viṃññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaṃñāyatanaṃ nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viṃññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti
nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ vā maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ vā maṃñi nibbānato vā maṃñi nibbānam meti vā maṃñi nibbānaṃ vāabhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sekhābhavivaddhavaseti dutiyakaṃbhūmiparicchedo
yo
pi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitvātavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ maṃñati paṭhavitoyā maṃñati paṭhavim meti maṃñati paṭhavi nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariṃ
ñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbāṇato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbāṇato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānam meti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
khīṇāsavāha paṭhamakanaye tatiyakabhūmiparicchedi
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitvātavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadantottho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammaṃdaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviviṃ na maṃña
ti paṭhaviyā na maṃñati paṭhavito na maṃñati paṭhavim meti na maṃñati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbāṇato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na maṃññati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃññati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānam meti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa
hetu khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā khīṇāsvāha dutiyakaṇaye cattārivānakaṃbhūmiparicchedi
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitvātavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ na maṃñati paṭhaviyā na maṃñati paṭhavito na maṃ
ñati paṭhavimmeti na maṃñati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vitadosattā āpa tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānammeti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vītadosattā
khīṇāsavā tatiyakanaye pañcakavānakabhūmiparicchedi
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anupappattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ na maṃñati paṭhaviyā na maññati paṭhavito na mañña
ti paṭhavimmeti na maṃñati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vītamohattā āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijāṇāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na masaṃmaṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānammeti na maṃññañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ
kissa hetu khayā mohassa vītamohattā khīṇāsavāhacatutthakanaye chaapānakabhūmiparicchedi
tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ na maṃñati paṭhaviyā na maṃñati paṭhavito na maṃñati paṭha
vimmeti na maṃñati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariṃñātaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānammeti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nā
bhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariṃñāṇaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi satthārahapaṭhamakanaye sattaapānakabhūmiparicchedi
tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ na maṃñati paṭhaviyā na maṃñati paṭhavi
to na maṃñati paṭhavim meti na maṃñati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāga nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmi āpaṃ
tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānammeti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkha
ve tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirerodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmī ti satthāraha dutiyakanaye aṭṭhavānakabhūmiparicchedi idamavoca bhagavā te bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti mūlapariyāyasu
ttaṃ paṭhamaṃ
